field.name: pretext
field.label: Pre-text
field.description: This is the text or HTML that is displayed above the login form.

field.name: posttext
field.label: Post-text
field.description: This is the text or HTML that is displayed below the login form.

field.name: login
field.label: Login Redirection Page
field.description: Select the page the user will be redirected to after a successful login. Select from all the pages listed in the dropdown menu. Choosing 'Default' will return to the same page.

field.name: logout
field.label: Logout Redirection Page
field.description: Select the page the user will be redirected to after successfully ending their current session by logging out. Select from all the pages listed in the dropdown menu. Choosing 'Default' will return to the same page.

field.name: name
field.label: Show Name/Username
field.description: Displays name or username after logging

field.name: usesecure
field.label: Encrypt Login Form
field.description: Submit encrypted login data (requires SSL). Do not enable this option if Joomla is not accessible using the https:// protocol prefix.
